Term Date: Tuesday 28 January (students start 29 January in government schools)  2025 to Friday 4 April 2025
Starts between Monday 27 January and Friday 7 February and ends Friday 11 April 2025
Monday 6 October to no later than Friday 19 December 2025
School Holidays Date: Start no later than Saturday 20 December 2025 and run for 5 or 6 weeks (from school's closing date until opening date of school the following year).
